alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 2:33AM CDT until April 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SEBASTIAN...NORTHEASTERN HASKELL...SOUTHEASTERN SEQUOYAH AND NORTHEASTERN LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 233 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Spiro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Sallisaw... Pocola... Spiro... Arkoma... Hackett... Bonanza... Gans... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Rye Hill... Jenson... Cottonwood... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 315 and 316. Interstate 540 between mile markers 12 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
